text: Deep Throat is a 1972 American pornographic film. In it Linda Lovelace plays herself. She was paid $1250 for acting in the movie. The movie was directed by Gerard Damiano. In 1974 Deep Throat Part II was released. The movie was made in New York. A documentary about Deep Throat called Inside Deep Throat was released in 2004. ==References== Category:1972 movies Category:English- language movies Category:Pornographic movies Category:American movies Category:Movies set in Miami Category:Obscenity controversies
title: Deep Throat (movie)
